original_title: Government Policy Statement passed in Parliament
original_body_lines: The resolution on the statement of the Government Policy, which was presented by President Anura Kumara Dissanayake in Parliament on November 21, was passed unanimously in Parliament today (04) without a vote.
The debate on the statement of the Government Policy was held as a two-day debate from 9.30 am to 5.30 pm yesterday (03) and from 9.30 am to 5.00 pm today (04).
